neutral.label: Neutral
neutral.prompt: A clean, neutral rendering of the character.

dramatic.label: Dramatic Lighting
dramatic.prompt: High contrast dramatic lighting, rim light, cinematic shadows.

anime.label: Anime Style
anime.prompt: Anime style, bold outlines, expressive eyes, vibrant colors.

pixel.label: Pixel Art
pixel.prompt: Pixel art style, 16-bit, crisp edges, limited palette.
